Wherefore<S>3767</S> laying aside<S>659</S> all<S>3956</S> malice<S>2549</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> guile<S>1388</S>, and<S>2532</S> hypocrisies<S>5272</S>, and<S>2532</S> envies<S>5355</S>, and<S>2532</S> all<S>3956</S> evil speakings<S>2636</S>,
As<S>5613</S> newborn<S>738</S> babes<S>1025</S>, desire<S>1971</S> the sincere<S>97</S> milk<S>1051</S> of the word<S>3050</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye may grow<S>837</S> thereby<S>1722</S> <S>846</S>:
If so be<S>1512</S> ye have tasted<S>1089</S> that<S>3754</S> the Lord<S>2962</S> is gracious<S>5543</S>.
To<S>4314</S> whom<S>3739</S> coming<S>4334</S>, as unto a living<S>2198</S> stone<S>3037</S>, disallowed<S>593</S> indeed<S>3303</S> of<S>5259</S> men<S>444</S>, but<S>1161</S> chosen<S>1588</S> of<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S>, and precious<S>1784</S>,
Ye<S>846</S> also<S>2532</S>, as<S>5613</S> lively<S>2198</S> stones<S>3037</S>, are built up<S>3618</S> a spiritual<S>4152</S> house<S>3624</S>, an holy<S>40</S> priesthood<S>2406</S>, to offer up<S>399</S> spiritual<S>4152</S> sacrifices<S>2378</S>, acceptable<S>2144</S> to God<S>2316</S> by<S>1223</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>. <sup>are: or, be ye</sup>
Wherefore<S>1352</S> also<S>2532</S> it is contained<S>4023</S> in<S>1722</S> the scripture<S>1124</S>, Behold<S>2400</S>, I lay<S>5087</S> in<S>1722</S> Sion<S>4622</S> a chief corner<S>204</S> stone<S>3037</S>, elect<S>1588</S>, precious<S>1784</S>: and<S>2532</S> he that believeth<S>4100</S> on<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> shall<S>2617</S> not be<S>3364</S> confounded<S>2617</S>.
Unto you<S>5213</S> therefore<S>3767</S> which<S>3588</S> believe<S>4100</S> he is precious<S>5092</S>: but<S>1161</S> unto them which be disobedient<S>544</S>, the stone<S>3037</S> which<S>3739</S> the builders<S>3618</S> disallowed<S>593</S>, the same<S>3778</S> is made<S>1096</S> <S>1519</S> the head<S>2776</S> of the corner<S>1137</S>, <sup>precious: or, an honour</sup>
And<S>2532</S> a stone<S>3037</S> of stumbling<S>4348</S>, and<S>2532</S> a rock<S>4073</S> of offence<S>4625</S>, even to them which<S>3739</S> stumble<S>4350</S> at the word<S>3056</S>, being disobedient<S>544</S>: whereunto<S>1519</S> <S>3739</S> also<S>2532</S> they were appointed<S>5087</S>.
But<S>1161</S> ye<S>5210</S> are a chosen<S>1588</S> generation<S>1085</S>, a royal<S>934</S> priesthood<S>2406</S>, an holy<S>40</S> nation<S>1484</S>, a peculiar<S>1519</S> <S>4047</S> people<S>2992</S>; that<S>3704</S> ye should shew forth<S>1804</S> the praises<S>703</S> of him who hath called<S>2564</S> you<S>5209</S> out of<S>1537</S> darkness<S>4655</S> into<S>1519</S> his<S>846</S> marvellous<S>2298</S> light<S>5457</S>: <sup>peculiar: or, purchased</sup> <sup>praises: or, virtues</sup>
Which<S>3588</S> in time past<S>4218</S> were not<S>3756</S> a people<S>2992</S>, but<S>1161</S> are now<S>3568</S> the people<S>2992</S> of God<S>2316</S>: which<S>3588</S> had<S>1653</S> not<S>3756</S> obtained mercy<S>1653</S>, but<S>1161</S> now<S>3568</S> have obtained mercy<S>1653</S>.
Dearly beloved<S>27</S>, I beseech<S>3870</S> you as<S>5613</S> strangers<S>3941</S> and<S>2532</S> pilgrims<S>3927</S>, abstain from<S>567</S> fleshly<S>4559</S> lusts<S>1939</S>, which<S>3748</S> war<S>4754</S> against<S>2596</S> the soul<S>5590</S>;
Having<S>2192</S> your<S>5216</S> conversation<S>391</S> honest<S>2570</S> among<S>1722</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S>: that<S>2443</S>, whereas<S>1722</S> <S>3739</S> they speak against<S>2635</S> you<S>5216</S> as<S>5613</S> evildoers<S>2555</S>, they may<S>1392</S> by<S>1537</S> your good<S>2570</S> works<S>2041</S>, which they shall behold<S>2029</S>, glorify<S>1392</S> God<S>2316</S> in<S>1722</S> the day<S>2250</S> of visitation<S>1984</S>. <sup>whereas: or, wherein</sup>
<S>3767</S> Submit yourselves<S>5293</S> to every<S>3956</S> ordinance<S>2937</S> of man<S>442</S> for<S>1223</S> the Lord's sake<S>2962</S>: whether it be<S>1535</S> to the king<S>935</S>, as<S>5613</S> supreme<S>5242</S>;
Or<S>1535</S> unto governors<S>2232</S>, as<S>5613</S> unto them that are sent<S>3992</S> by<S>1223</S> him<S>846</S> for<S>1519</S> <S>3303</S> the punishment<S>1557</S> of evildoers<S>2555</S>, and<S>1161</S> for the praise<S>1868</S> of them that do well<S>17</S>.
For<S>3754</S> so<S>3779</S> is<S>2076</S> the will<S>2307</S> of God<S>2316</S>, that with well doing<S>15</S> ye may put to silence<S>5392</S> the ignorance<S>56</S> of foolish<S>878</S> men<S>444</S>:
As<S>5613</S> free<S>1658</S>, and<S>2532</S> not<S>3361</S> using<S>2192</S> your liberty<S>1657</S> for<S>5613</S> a cloke<S>1942</S> of maliciousness<S>2549</S>, but<S>235</S> as<S>5613</S> the servants<S>1401</S> of God<S>2316</S>. <sup>using: Gr. having</sup>
Honour<S>5091</S> all<S>3956</S> men. Love<S>25</S> the brotherhood<S>81</S>. Fear<S>5399</S> God<S>2316</S>. Honour<S>5091</S> the king<S>935</S>. <sup>Honour all: or, Esteem all</sup>
Servants<S>3610</S>, be subject<S>5293</S> to your masters<S>1203</S> with<S>1722</S> all<S>3956</S> fear<S>5401</S>; not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> to the good<S>18</S> and<S>2532</S> gentle<S>1933</S>, but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> to the froward<S>4646</S>.
For<S>1063</S> this<S>5124</S> is thankworthy<S>5485</S>, if<S>1487</S> a man<S>5100</S> for<S>1223</S> conscience<S>4893</S> toward God<S>2316</S> endure<S>5297</S> grief<S>3077</S>, suffering<S>3958</S> wrongfully<S>95</S>. <sup>thankworthy: or, thank</sup>
For<S>1063</S> what<S>4169</S> glory<S>2811</S> is it, if<S>1487</S>, when<S>2532</S> ye be buffeted<S>2852</S> for your faults<S>264</S>, ye shall take it patiently<S>5278</S>? but<S>235</S> if<S>1487</S>, when ye do well<S>15</S>, and<S>2532</S> suffer<S>3958</S> for it, ye take it patiently<S>5278</S>, this<S>5124</S> is acceptable<S>5485</S> with<S>3844</S> God<S>2316</S>. <sup>acceptable: or, thank</sup>
For<S>1063</S> even<S>1519</S> hereunto<S>5124</S> were ye called<S>2564</S>: because<S>3754</S> Christ<S>5547</S> also<S>2532</S> suffered<S>3958</S> for<S>5228</S> us<S>2257</S>, leaving<S>5277</S> us<S>2254</S> an example<S>5261</S>, that<S>2443</S> ye should follow<S>1872</S> his<S>846</S> steps<S>2487</S>: <sup>for us: some read, for you</sup>
Who<S>3739</S> did<S>4160</S> no<S>3756</S> sin<S>266</S>, neither<S>3761</S> was guile<S>1388</S> found<S>2147</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> mouth<S>4750</S>:
Who<S>3739</S>, when he was reviled<S>3058</S>, reviled<S>486</S> not<S>3756</S> again<S>486</S>; when he suffered<S>3958</S>, he threatened<S>546</S> not<S>3756</S>; but<S>1161</S> committed<S>3860</S> himself to him that judgeth<S>2919</S> righteously<S>1346</S>: <sup>himself: or, his cause</sup>
Who<S>3739</S> his own self<S>846</S> bare<S>399</S> our<S>2257</S> sins<S>266</S> in<S>1722</S> his own<S>846</S> body<S>4983</S> on<S>1909</S> the tree<S>3586</S>, that<S>2443</S> we<S>2198</S>, being dead<S>581</S> to sins<S>266</S>, should live<S>2198</S> unto righteousness<S>1343</S>: by<S>3739</S> whose<S>846</S> stripes<S>3468</S> ye were healed<S>2390</S>. <sup>on: or, to</sup>
For<S>1063</S> ye were<S>2258</S> as<S>5613</S> sheep<S>4263</S> going astray<S>4105</S>; but<S>235</S> are<S>1994</S> now<S>3568</S> returned<S>1994</S> unto<S>1909</S> the Shepherd<S>4166</S> and<S>2532</S> Bishop<S>1985</S> of your<S>5216</S> souls<S>5590</S>.
